propose.socratic: How about we set you a goal of $X {currentGoal}?
propose.authoritative: We should set you a goal of $X {currentGoal}

confirm.*: Sure, $X {currentGoal} sounds like a good goal

reject.*: No, I don't think I can manage $X {currentGoal}

end.*: Fantastic! I'm sure you'll reach it!

explain.socratic: Well, it's a very achievable goal for you

explain.authoritative: It's a reasonable goal for you
explain.socratic: Well, you will definitely manage it
